co.cask.coopr.store.tenant
Class SQLTenantStore

java.lang.Object
  com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      co.cask.coopr.store.tenant.SQLTenantStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
TenantStore, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
public class SQLTenantStore
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
implements TenantStore

Implementation of TenantStore using a SQL database as the persistent store.

getNameForId

public String getNameForId(String id)
                    throws IOException
Get the name of the tenant with the given id. Id to name mapping is cached, so this will not involve an io operation except for the first time it is called.

Specified by:
getNameForId in interface TenantStore
Parameters:
id - Id of the tenant to get the name for
Returns:
Name of the tenant with the given id, or null if the tenant does not exist
Throws:
IOException
